props.name: iconAs
props.docblock:
Component that renders the icon, currently defaults to `FontAwesomeIcon`,
 but is going to be deprecated soon, please use Paragon's icons instead.

description.text:
Component that renders the icon, currently defaults to `FontAwesomeIcon`,
 but is going to be deprecated soon, please use Paragon's icons instead.

props.name: src
props.docblock:
An icon component to render. Example import of a Paragon icon component:
`import { Check } from '@edx/paragon/dist/icon';`

description.text:
An icon component to render. Example import of a Paragon icon component:
`import { Check } from '@edx/paragon/dist/icon';`

props.name: alt
props.docblock:
Alt text for your icon. For best practice, avoid using alt text to describe
the image in the `IconButton`. Instead, we recommend describing the function
of the button.

description.text:
Alt text for your icon. For best practice, avoid using alt text to describe
the image in the `IconButton`. Instead, we recommend describing the function
of the button.

props.name: invertColors
props.docblock: Changes icon styles for dark background

description.text: Changes icon styles for dark background

props.name: iconClassNames
props.docblock: Extra class names that will be added to the icon

description.text: Extra class names that will be added to the icon

props.name: isActive
props.docblock: whether to show the `IconButton` in an active state, whose styling is distinct from default state

description.text: whether to show the `IconButton` in an active state, whose styling is distinct from default state

props.name: tooltipPlacement
props.docblock: tooltip placement can be top, left, right etc, per https://popper.js.org/docs/v2/constructors/#options

description.text: tooltip placement can be top, left, right etc, per https://popper.js.org/docs/v2/constructors/#options

props.name: tooltipContent
props.docblock: any valid JSX or text to be rendered as tooltip contents

description.text: any valid JSX or text to be rendered as tooltip contents

props.docblock: Changes icon styles for dark background

description.text: Changes icon styles for dark background
